feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: Rewrote and Added Swaparr
entry.content:
Original Project - https://github.com/ThijmenGThN/swaparr

Converted and built swappar native to Huntarr! NOTE THIS IS FOR TORRENT USERS!

What's Changed

  • Intergration of Swappar by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/230
  • Added Swappar by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/231 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.1.2...6.1.3

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Added History, Stateful Tracking, and Interface Cleanup

  • Overhauled visual appearance & CSS
  • Random search mode is mandatory and remove sequential due to complexity
  • Add Stateful Tracking 2.0 to keep track of items processed by app and instance
  • [Sonarr] Removed Season [Solo] mode as it provided no beneifit
  • Changed Buttons of Logs and Settings to Drops Downs to finally make more mobile friendly
  • Fully mobile friendly compared to prior design
  • Changed Whisparr to support v2
  • Added History Mode
  • Debug Mode work properly
  • Moved Advanced Settings for each app to one Advanced Settings under settings
  • Fixed bug where you could not set missing items to 0 (to disable)

  • Statics Front Page Reset Bug gone

  • A240 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/245

  • More Features including history by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/248
  • A351 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/250
  • A362 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/252
  • A501 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/253
  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/254

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.1.5...6.2.0
